title: Looking for a uni team, Victoria

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
Hi everyone, if there is a chance I would like to participate in the OCE Uni championship. 
I am from Monash Uni.
And my LOL user name is 
BM Papa. {{champion:4}} 
Feel free to add me and have a chat with me if you are interested.

replies.body: I am from Monash Uni Clayton and I organise all LoL related things for the uni in conjunction with the Society of Video Games Appreciation. I'll add you for a chat cause we are building teams of all levels currently to compete.
what is your user name so i know it's you who added me.
the name you comment with is your IGN...
I'm pretty sure right now Monash has two teams. My friend is in one of them.  If you check out the Monash club at Clayton they could put you in a team.

is there like a website or facebook page for me to contact Monash teams?
Thanks

Hi, I'm from Monash University as well but in Caulfield campus.
I'm not sure if there is any LoL club in our uni but I would be interested in taking part in this tournament with you.

However, I am only Silver 4 in ranked and struggling to improve to be honest.
I'm happy to spend a few hours out of uni time to train if you dun mind helping me out and maybe we can take part in this OCE Uni Championship together?

You can add me in game and we can have a chat about it if you're interested in what I proposed.
My ign is: KaizerOP

Also, I might have a friend who is interested to take part as well but he is also around the same level as me.

Hope to hear from you soon. Cheers. ^^
